attributes.action: have built an army memorial museum in Newcastle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to try and have the prime minister allow an army memorial museum be built in Newcastle-upon-tyne. This is because I feel the army do not have enough attention as they should do, and the only attention they get is from media/press. I hope the prime minister decides to allow this as I am joining the army and would like to have something to be proud of.
